bilingual.source: It brings back the father's memory of carrying the son on his back.
bilingual.target: 这让父亲想起了背儿子的记忆。

bilingual.source: Some scientists, for example, believe that memory and smell are connected.
bilingual.target: 例如，一些科学家认为记忆和气味是相连的。

bilingual.source: And as the summer came to an end, Irniq and Samuel's friendship became a distant memory.
bilingual.target: 随着夏天的结束，伊尔尼克和塞缪尔的友谊成为了遥远的记忆。

bilingual.source: She has a good memory for faces.
He lost his memory of that day.
bilingual.target: 他失去了对那天的记忆。

list.abstract: memory（英[ˈmeməri]，美[ˈmeməri]），英语单词，名词，意思为记忆力；记性；记忆中事物。短语搭配有in memory of（为纪念），例句为“By using memory and fluency tests.（通过记忆和流畅性测试）”。 memory名词类近义词有mind、retention。
罗雪瑶，生于1999-01-25。业余歌手，在校学生。代表作《Memory》。

yingyinNormal.en: Reinforcing my "water has memory" theory. Mm. Water has memory.
yingyinNormal.zh: 再次证明了我说的水有记忆的理论。水有记忆。

yingyinNormal.en: We call this the Memory Tree.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是记忆之树。

yingyinNormal.en: Thank goodness water has memory.
yingyinNormal.zh: 幸亏水有记忆。

yingyinNormal.en: Sheldon has kind of a photographic memory.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢尔顿有图像式记忆的能力。

yingyinNormal.en: Wait, what. What happened? A core memory! Oh no.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，怎么了？一个核心记忆！哦，不。

yingyinNormal.en: Long term memory data selection via channel sober be.
yingyinNormal.zh: 通过清醒的渠道选择长期记忆数据。

yingyinNormal.en: And what is your earliest memory of the character Spock?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你对史波克这角色最早的记忆是什么呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Thousands of you. Memory wiped. Programmed to kill.
yingyinNormal.zh: 成千上万个你。被抹除了记忆。成为了杀人工具。

yingyinNormal.en: Interferes with the memory. The memory. Yes. I want to thank you, Ivan, for allowing me to use it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 会干扰记忆。记忆。没错。我要谢谢你，埃文，让我使用。

yingyinNormal.en: Are you a ghost? A memory, preserved in a diary for 50 years.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是鬼吗？记忆。我是留存在日记中五十年的记忆。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: That's long term memory. An endless swarm of corridors and shelves. I read about it in the manuals.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是长期记忆，无尽的走廊和记忆架子，我在手册里读到过。

yingyinNormal.en: All our memory bearings from the time. They were all damaged in the Blackout. But there are sometimes fragments.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所有的记忆存储文件都在大断电时损坏了。但是有的还保留了碎片记忆图像。

yingyinNormal.en: You can't have your precious memory falling into the wrong hands, now, can you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不能让自己的宝贵记忆被敌人窃取，是吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe, because you told him not to. What are you, the memory woman?
yingyinNormal.zh: 可能因为你叫他别再打来。你到底是什么？记忆女王吗？

yingyinNormal.en: They say you're the best memory-maker there is. Well, then, they're kind.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们说你是全宇宙最棒的记忆制造者。他们过奖了。

yingyinNormal.en: They all think it's about more detail. But that's not how memory works.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们都觉得真实的记忆就该细节丰富。但其实并非如此。

yingyinNormal.en: My memory has been wiped to protect... The security of the mission. Yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的记忆已经被清除了，以保... 任务的安全。没错。

yingyinNormal.en: I guess I should've known that's what I would become for you, just another memory.
yingyinNormal.zh: 或许我早该知道，我之于你，将不过是另一段记忆。

yingyinNormal.en: Your memory? The date carved beneath. Six, 10 and 21. Coincidence?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你记忆中的木马？底部刻的日期。2021年6月10日。这是巧合么？

yingyinNormal.en: Sweetie, we have a bad connection. I can't hear you so well. What did you say about memory?
yingyinNormal.zh: 宝贝，讯号不好，我听不太清楚，你是说什么记忆？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: something remembered from the past; a recollection

examination_example.sentence: These purchases often become more valuable with time — as stories or <highlight>memories</highlight> — particularly if they involve feeling more connected to others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着时间的推移，这些购买往往会变得更有价值——作为故事或回忆——尤其是当它们涉及到与他人的联系更为紧密时。

examination_example.sentence: We rose-tint our <highlight>memories</highlight> and put ourselves into self-affirming situations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们美化我们的回忆，让自己处于自我肯定的状态。

examination_example.sentence: When I think of a sad <highlight>memory</highlight>, I do what everybody does — try to put it to one side.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我想起一段悲伤的记忆时，我会做每个人都会做的事——试着把它放在一边。

sense_info_list.en: the power or process of remembering

examination_example.sentence: Another set of participants had to count backward from 1,000 by nines as they watched the clips, occupying their conscious working <highlight>memory</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一组参与者在观看视频时必须从1000倒数到9，占据他们有意识的工作记忆。

examination_example.sentence: The Web-based program allows you to systematically improve your <highlight>memory</highlight> and attention skills.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 基于网络的程序可以让你系统地提高你的记忆力和注意力技能。

examination_example.sentence: Powerful <highlight>memory</highlight> doesn't make my emotions any more acute or vivid.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 强大的记忆力并没有让我的情绪变得更加敏锐和生动。

sense_info_list.en: the remembering or commemoration of a dead person

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: You need pretty complicated cognitive skills and <highlight>memory</highlight> skills to be able to do that.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你需要相当复杂的认知技能和记忆技能才能做到这一点。

examination_example.sentence: Both absent-minded doodling and copying from life have been shown to positively affect your <highlight>memory</highlight> and visual perception.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 生活中心不在焉的涂鸦和临摹都被证明对你的记忆和视觉有积极的影响。

examination_example.sentence: It helps improve concentration and <highlight>memory</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它有助于提高注意力和记忆力。

sense_info_list.en: the store of things learned and kept in the mind

examination_example.sentence: Why does a negative encounter with strangers stick in one's <highlight>memory</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么与陌生人的负面接触会留在一个人的记忆中？

examination_example.sentence: You may occasionally have a negative encounter that might stick in your <highlight>memory</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可能偶尔会有一次负面的遭遇，这可能会留在你的记忆中。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 记忆丧失；记忆损失；内存损耗

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the power or process of remembering

examination_example.sentence: Scientists at University College London used <highlight>memory</highlight> and fluency tests on the same group of people six years apart.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 伦敦大学学院的科学家对同一组人进行了相隔六年的记忆力和流畅性测试。

examination_example.sentence: Watching more than three hours of television a day doubles <highlight>memory</highlight> loss in older people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 老年人每天看电视超过三个小时，记忆力会成倍减退。

examination_example.sentence: Physical activity can improve blood flow to the brain, fueling <highlight>memory</highlight>, attention and creativity, which are essential to learning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 体育活动可以促进血液流向大脑，增强记忆，注意力和创造力——这些都是学习的必要条件。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (in memory of)纪念; 作为...的纪念

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 纪念建筑；纪念碑；纪念馆；请愿书；纪念性的；记录；用以纪念的；追悼的；年代记；外交备忘录

word_family.mean: n. 记忆力；记性；记忆中事物；回忆；存储器；记忆；记忆范围；纪念；记忆所及年限；内存

examination_example.sentence: When you sleep, your brain sorts through everything that happened during the day, trying to link new experiences to old <highlight>memories</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你睡觉时，你的大脑会整理白天发生的一切，试图将新的经历与旧的记忆联系起来。

examination_example.sentence: As the song goes, this long and winding road "will never disappear", and it will always stick in the visitor's <highlight>memory</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正如歌中所唱，这条漫长而曲折的道路“永远不会消失”，它将永远留在游客的记忆中。

examination_example.sentence: Then go outside and work out a plan to translate your childhood <highlight>memories</highlight> into your grown-up garden.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后走出去，制定一个计划，将你童年的记忆转化为你长大后的花园。

sense_info_list.zh: (in memory of)纪念; 作为...的纪念

examination_example.sentence: We'd also like to visit Graceland, the popular museum in <highlight>memory</highlight> of Elvis Presley.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们还想去格雷斯兰，那是一个纪念埃Elvis Presley的著名博物馆。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 记忆力；记性；记忆中事物；回忆；存储器；记忆；记忆范围；纪念；记忆所及年限；内存

examination_example.sentence: According to Sparrow, we are not becoming people with poor <highlight>memories</highlight> as a result of the Internet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据斯派洛的说法，我们不会因为互联网而变成记忆力差的人。

examination_example.sentence: A culture's best storytellers had good <highlight>memories</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一种文化中最好的故事讲述者有着美好的回忆。

examination_example.sentence: Amy wants to keep her old things because they bring back sweet <highlight>memories</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 艾米想保留她的旧东西，因为它们能勾起甜蜜的回忆。
